contents.text: Welcome to OpenAI in San Francisco, where we’re discovering and enacting the path to safe artificial general intelligence.
For research and partnership inquiries, press 1.
To learn about our latest AI research breakthroughs, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our research team.

navigationGoals: I need a concise update on OpenAI’s latest AI research breakthroughs.
Learn about OpenAI’s current research on AI-driven mental health support for veterans
I’d like an in-depth briefing on OpenAI’s latest model architectures and research methodologies.
I’d like someone to explain OpenAI’s latest research findings to me.
Ask for an overview of OpenAI’s newest research relevant to physics simulations

contents.text: To discuss partnership opportunities with OpenAI, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships department.

navigationGoals: I’d like to explore a partnership opportunity between my company and OpenAI.
Explore partnering with OpenAI to build AI tools for veteran reintegration programs
I want to explore a strategic partnership to integrate OpenAI’s models into our enterprise AI roadmap.
I want to speak with someone about partnering my organization with OpenAI.
Explore a potential collaboration between my university lab and OpenAI

contents.text: For API services and developer support, press 2.
For API access, pricing, and billing questions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our API support specialists.

navigationGoals: I need details on OpenAI API pricing tiers and how to adjust my subscription.
Obtain API pricing and sign-up details to develop a PTSD support chatbot
I need details on API access tiers, rate limits, and enterprise billing structures.
I need help understanding OpenAI API pricing and billing.
Inquire about student pricing and access tiers for the OpenAI API

contents.text: For technical troubleshooting and integration assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: I’m encountering errors integrating the OpenAI API and need technical assistance.
Get help troubleshooting integration of the OpenAI API into my veteran assistance app
I'm troubleshooting OAuth token errors in my Python integration and need technical support.
I’m having trouble setting up the API and need technical assistance.
Request assistance integrating the OpenAI API into my physics data analysis code
